attributes.action: Reduce MP expenses & items they can claim for
attributes.additional_details:
Its time those that get expenses from being a PM, Lord or MP had them regulated a lot harder especially in this time of austerity after all 

"were in this together" 

Expenses should be limited to Stationary, Economy Travel (want more pay the rest out of your pocket like every other worker has to), basic rate for hotels

No Gardner, Maids, repairs or tv licenses paid for, limited drinks expenses, No 2nd home paid for 

The tax payer isn't paying for those in power to live a luxury life.
attributes.background: MPs are spending far too much of the tax payers money on personal gains its time we regulated their expenses to solely what benefits the country

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority makes decisions relating to MP's expenses and is independent of both Parliament and Government. 

If you would like to contact IPSA to make this suggestion, here’s how to contact them:

http://parliamentarystandards.org.uk/About%20Us/Pages/Contact-Us.aspx
